docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Feb. 9--The inquiry into an alleged plot directed from abroad to sow strife in Argentina ended abruptly tonight, when it was announced that because of new evidence all the suspects had been released and the informer himself was being...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Feb. 9--The inquiry into an alleged plot directed from abroad to sow strife in Argentina ended abruptly tonight, when it was announced that because of new evidence all the suspects had been released and the informer himself was being held for trial.
docs.abstract: Oppens freed; informer E Crouch held for trial

headline.main: ARGENTINA FREES SUSPECTS IN 'PLOT'; 2 U.S. Citizens and a Briton Released--Informer Held for Trial on Calumny

docs.snippet: TEL AVIV, Israel, Feb. 18--Two thousand Jewish athletes from between thirty-five and forty countries are expected to compete in the World Jewish Olympic Games to be held in Israel between Sept. 27 and Oct. 8. Sponsored by the World Maccabi Union, the...
docs.lead_paragraph: TEL AVIV, Israel, Feb. 18--Two thousand Jewish athletes from between thirty-five and forty countries are expected to compete in the World Jewish Olympic Games to be held in Israel between Sept. 27 and Oct. 8. Sponsored by the World Maccabi Union, the games are called "Third Maccabiah."
